definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: Vegetable elder sister Yue now body weak, the emotion ought no undulate too many.
sentences.chinese: 素月姐現在身子虛弱，情緒不宜太過波動。

sentences.english: But the internal inertia against doing so appears too great at this time.
sentences.chinese: 但反對這種作爲的內部惰性這次似乎顯得太過強大了。

sentences.english: Some words do a miss house not say too to keep white.
sentences.chinese: 有些話做牛觀花家的不好說的太過直白了。
不要把你的激情太過沉迷於流行文化。

sentences.english: Jarvis says this definition is too tidy.
sentences.chinese: 賈維斯說，這種定義太過簡單化。

sentences.english: My goal against Modena is now a distant memory.
sentences.chinese: 我對莫德納的進球已經是太過遙遠的記憶了。

sentences.english: She fusses too much about her health; she's always trying some new medicines.
sentences.chinese: 她對身體太過擔心，她總是試着喫新藥。

sentences.english: Some would say it is too flexible.
sentences.chinese: 有些人可能會說它太過靈活。

sentences.english: Hip, edgy jeans make him think you're too cool for school.
sentences.chinese: 低腰的窄腳牛仔褲會讓他覺得你太過前衛。

sentences.english: Just make sure not to come across as too self-promotional.
sentences.chinese: 只需要保證沒有太過自我宣傳。

sentences.english: What is too cruel, what makes people calm?
sentences.chinese: 是什麼太過無情，是什麼讓人心如止水？

sentences.english: Stick with waht you know, don't get too fancy.
sentences.chinese: 投資在你所認識的，不要太過花巧的東西。

sentences.english: I was not too gentle, slightly watched on excised .
sentences.chinese: 我當時並沒有太過在意，略略看了一下就刪掉了。

sentences.english: Effective use of body language is advisable. However don't want to overdo it.
sentences.chinese: 有效地使用肢體語言是明智之選，但是不要做得太過。

sentences.english: You vastly overrate your powers of persuasion.
sentences.chinese: 你太過高估了自己的說服力。

sentences.english: Pat was concerned winning it all would make us too comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 帕特擔心大獲全勝會使我們太過愜意放鬆。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
